member.name: T:Skunked.Cribbage
member.summary: The class for creating and modeling a game of Cribbage. "Plays" are validated and stored as a stream of events. Event listeners allow de-normalized state to be created from the stream.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperationException.Operation
member.summary: Gets the invalid cribbage operation that was attempted.

member.name: T:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation
member.summary: Set of exception types that can be thrown by the game when a rule is violated.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.CutCardPlayerAlreadyCut
member.summary: Player already cut a card from the deck.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.CutCardCardAlreadyCut
member.summary: A player already this card from the deck.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.NotPlayersTurn
member.summary: Player attempted to play when not their turn.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.CardHasBeenPlayed
member.summary: The played card has already been played.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.CardsHaveBeenThrown
member.summary: Player can not rethrow their cards.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.InvalidPlayer
member.summary: It is not the given players' turn.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.InvalidStateForPlay
member.summary: The game is not currently in the play.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.InvalidCard
member.summary: Card can not be used. This may be because the player was not dealt the card.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.InvalidStateForCount
member.summary: The hand can not be counted in the current state of the game.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.InvalidStateForCribCount
member.summary: The crib can not be counted in the current state of the game.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.InvalidShowCount
member.summary: The player announced a score that was not possible with the given hand.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.PlayerHasAlreadyCounted
member.summary: The player has already counted their hand in this round.

member.name: F:Skunked.InvalidCribbageOperation.InvalidRequest
member.summary: The parameters of the game were violated.

member.summary: Runs a game of cribbage with the given player strategies provided. Used for testing, AI comparison, or any other need to run through many games automatically.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Run a game of cribbage using the provided .
member.returns: The game of cribbage after it has completed.

member.summary: An interface to implement an automated player's decisions.

member.name: T:Skunked.LinqExtended
member.summary: Functionally similar projections as LINQ library.

member.name: M:Skunked.LinqExtended.Cartesian``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``1})
member.summary: Returns the Cartesian product of two sequences by enumerating all possible combinations of one item from each sequence, and applying a user-defined projection to the items in a given combination.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of .
The type of the elements of .
member.returns: A sequence of elements.

remarks.para: The method returns items in the same order as a nested foreach loop, but all sequences except for are cached when iterated over. The cache is then re-used for any subsequent iterations.
This method uses deferred execution and stream its results.
